page.title: 18ATTITUDES IN KINGS NORTON
page.content: We held a survey to find out attitudes towards men and women amongst the pare- ents at our school .On the whole we found out that women tend to do jobs like ironing 92% dusting 92% and cook- ing 92% and men tend to do jobs like sorting out the finances DIY 56% mech- anical jobs 44%,and decorating. Most people prefer a man for a mechanic 55% and a police constable 56% but a woman for a home help 92% and a nurse 55%. We asked if people thought a man should stand on a bus to allow a women to sit. 64% of men and 54% of women said yes. We asked if people thought a man should be the main breadwinner.70% of men and 46% of women said yes.We asked if people thought that women now had equal opportunity to men in employment. 29% of men and 43% of women said yes. By children of Class 2,Broadmeadow School.
